projects.title: Constitution of Pakistan Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot to answer questions about the Constitution of Pakistan.
projects.longDescription: Built an intelligent chatbot that allows users to explore and understand the Constitution of Pakistan in an interactive way. The system uses modern NLP techniques with LangChain and large language models to provide accurate, conversational responses. It supports semantic search across constitutional articles and delivers concise answers with references.

projects.title: YOLO Object Detection System
projects.description: An object detection system using YOLO to process images and video files with bounding boxes.
projects.longDescription: Built an object detection application powered by the YOLO model to analyze images and video files. The system detects multiple object classes with high accuracy, draws bounding boxes with labels, and allows users to download annotated outputs. Implemented with Streamlit for a simple and user-friendly interface.

projects.title: RCNN-Based Object Segmentation
projects.description: Object segmentation system using RCNN for detecting and segmenting objects in images.
projects.longDescription: Developed an object segmentation pipeline using RCNN to accurately detect and segment objects in images. The system generates pixel-level masks for multiple object classes and supports evaluation on standard datasets. Implemented with deep learning frameworks for high accuracy in computer vision tasks.
